title: Sideshow Cinema
description: Sideshow Cinema is a historic look at films that include human oddities such as little people, giants, human torsos, pinheads, Siamese twins and all types of deformities imaginable. Covering from the 1800's to the present, this is the most complete film history of sideshow performers ever written. This also covers the strangest movies ever made like weird westerns, scary circus films, giants apes, blaxploitation, gimmick films and salutes TV horror hosts.
author: Will Crawford
